title: Explain
body:
All I ask for is REASONABLE, LOGICAL and WELL THOUGHT OUT explanations on what actually goes into account when justifying "toxic" behavior. (If you don't play ranked, this doesn't apply to you) 
I really want to have a conversation with someone about this.

Please and thank you.

replies.body: Why don't you provide the chat logs you were given and we can talk about why your behavior specifically is toxic?
I haven't even been sent an email containing the chat logs.

It is displayed in the client when you attempt to login.

If you want, I can post them here for you.
My god, i'm a scumbag LuL xD

It's actually really simple: don't be a jerk.

Easier said than done for some people of course.

But hey, that's what chat restrictions & bans are for.
There's no justification for toxic behavior.
So I can get called a %%%got and "N" word in exchange for calling a kid a burger and I'm the one that gets banned.

If you're constantly being a dick, then yes.

The system cares way more about patterns of behavior. You being a little bit of a jerk, all the time, is a bigger deal to the system than the guy that is a big jerk once because it negatively impacts more games and more players.

> [{quoted}](name=Eskuhmoh,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bHig2Frr,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-03-02T07:23:12.178+0000)
>
> So I can get called a %%%got and "N" word in exchange for calling a kid a burger and I'm the one that gets banned.

Depending on how you called him a burger it can be seen as a ban
calling someone " a fucking retarded ass no skill burger go kys you piece of shit trash tier teammate" is not the same as "you're a burger"
%%%  adn %%%%%% are already trigger words for punishment
as rito does not tolerate hatespeech
I said "I may be shit but you're a burger lul"

> [{quoted}](name=Eskuhmoh,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bHig2Frr,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-02T23:24:51.589+0000)
>
> I said "I may be shit but you're a burger lul"

that can be viewed as harassment i guess
also open a support ticket they can provide the logs
or try logging into league of legends
the logs should be right there upon logging in

Tbh anyone is going to be toxic if they put their heart and soul in every ranked game. 

You gotta not care a little, or you'll go crazy lol.

I'll flame the hell out of my team in my mind, I just won't type anything lol

I wish the game encouraged players to try in ranked, as much as it promoted not being toxic. Not trying is worse than being toxic imo

I am toxic in some cases I'm not gonna lie, I've had my share of bans but with something so consistent that is getting kids in a ranked game that know absolutely nothing about the game it's my breaking point.

XD LOL

I feel you man XD. You just gotta not care sometimes. I suggest making a smurf account and getting some good practice on that account. That way you can improve in ranked, while not caring too much if you lose. Thats what im trying to do

In Riots stance, virtually nothing justifies what they consider to be "toxic". If you had a 4 man premade inting, trolling, and telling you to kill yourself, and you responded by telling them they're getting reported, you are being "toxic" according to Riot.
